ValueEntry.Name: Cryo Mixer
ValueEntry.Description: Mixes freezon, cryoplasm extract, and a bit of organic substrate to make your very own cryoplasm!

ValueEntry.Name: Cryo Melter Missile Crafter
ValueEntry.Description: Loads a missile with sulfur to enable it to melt a large volume of cryoplasm on impact.

ValueEntry.Name: Cryospawner Stun Missile Programmer
ValueEntry.Description: Further refines a melter missile to allow it to seek out cryospawners, temporarily blocking their cryoplasm production.

TerrainDataEntry.Name: Cryo Missile Turret
TerrainDataEntry.Description: Fires special missiles upon levitating cryoplasm and its spawners.

ValueEntry.Name: Cryo Missile Turret
ValueEntry.Description: Fires special missiles upon levitating cryoplasm and its spawners.
